nodes.text: The Clone Wars: The Secret Villain

The Clone Wars: The Secret Villain is a young reader's book based on Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series. It was released in January 2012. Written by Rob Valois, it was published as a Level 2 Penguin Young Readers title. It adapts Savage Opress' episodes.
To aid in his war against the Jedi, Count Dooku sets out to find a new student. Chosen from the best warriors in the galaxy, Savage Opress takes his place as the Sith Lord's new apprentice.
